Location Support

If you have more than one location and want to display them in separate Homebridge/HomeKit homes you can retrive only the devices at this loction name otherwise leave blank.
The location must match the location configured in the Wallbox app, review the log file to see the adresses as configured in the WallBox app.

Charging Estimate

The plugin will attempt to calulate in real time the percent charge added based on these values for each car. If no car is added then the display of a battery service will be supressed.
